about_the_game:
The sinner goes to hell. In Hell he meets other unfortunates. Hell is divided into squares for sinners.

For each sin there is a separate square.

Every square is watched over by demons. But they are lazy. Demons are tired of watching sinners, so they are often distracted. You need to solve many puzzles to trick the demons and escape from hell. The puzzles are seemingly complex, but often have simple solutions.

Instead of text, pictures are used that are understandable to everyone on the planet.
detailed_description:
The sinner goes to hell. In Hell he meets other unfortunates. Hell is divided into squares for sinners.

For each sin there is a separate square.

Every square is watched over by demons. But they are lazy. Demons are tired of watching sinners, so they are often distracted. You need to solve many puzzles to trick the demons and escape from hell. The puzzles are seemingly complex, but often have simple solutions.

Instead of text, pictures are used that are understandable to everyone on the planet.
name: Квадраты Ада Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Hell is divided into squares for sinners. For each sin there is a separate square. Bad smoker square - smoker is tempted by unavailable cigarettes. Bad Driver Square - The driver is always pushing the car uphill. Those who make a lot of noise jump up and down on a large subwoofer.
